column5: Thanks for that Dave, it's a really great story !!
What a wonderful thing to do for both of them. Great story.  muddler
That's an awesome thing to do !!! And glad the soldier got to have it back !!!! Wow .... Still some decent people left in the world !!!!! Cheers
That's an awesome thing to do !!! And glad the soldier got to have it back !!!! Wow .... Still some decent people left in the world !!!!! Cheers  That was a nice read.
That is a great story there are not many of them great men left. I say thank you to all who served.
